title:
Interface to gocr program by Joerg Schulenburg
    (http://jocr.sourceforge.net/)
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install kwb.gocr in R install.packages('kwb.gocr')  # Browse the kwb.gocr manual pages help(package = 'kwb.gocr')

title: Create a gocr Configuration — gocrConfig
text: Create gocr Configuration

title: Create a gocr Configuration — gocrConfig
code: gocrConfig(   inputfile,   showhelp = FALSE,   outputfile = "",   errorfile = "",   progressfile = "",   databasepath = "",   outputformat = "",   greylevel = 0,   dustsize = -1,   spacewidth = 0,   verbosity = 0,   limitVerbosityToChars = "",   limitRecognitionToChars = "",   certainty = 95,   mode = 0,   onlyRecogniseNumbers = FALSE )

title: Create a gocr Configuration — gocrConfig
text: inputfile -file: read input file (stdin file single dash) showhelp -h: show usage information outputfile -o file: send output file instead stdout. "" (default), file "gocrOut_<basename(outputfile)>" tempdir() used output file. errorfile -e file: send errors file instead stderr stdout file dash progressfile -x file: progress output file (file can file name, fifo name file descriptor 1...255), useful  GUI  developpers  show OCR progress, file descriptor argument available, compiled __USE_POSIX defined databasepath -p path: database path, populated images learned characters. "" (default), database needed, directory within folder installed package used outputformat -f format: output  format    recognized text (ISO8859_1 TeX HTML XML UTF8 ASCII), XML also output position probability data greylevel -l level set grey level level (0<160<=255, default: 0 autodetect), darker  pixels  belong characters, brighter pixels inter- preted background input image dustsize -d size: set dust size pixels (clusters smaller removed), 0 means clusters removed, default -1 auto detection spacewidth -s num: set spacewidth words units dots (default: 0 autodetect), wider widths interpreted  word  spaces, smaller character spaces verbosity -v verbosity: verbose stderr; verbosity bitfield. Use optionValueVerbosity get proper value limitVerbosityToChars -c string: verbose output characters string stderr, output   generated  characters within string, limitRecognitionToChars -C string: recognise characters string, filter function cases interest part   character alphabet certainty -certainty: set  value   certainty recognition (0..100; default: 95), characters higher certainty accepted, characters lower certainty treated unknown (recognized); set higher values, want certain recognized characters mode -m mode: set oprational mode; mode bitfield (default: 0). Use optionValueMode get proper value onlyRecogniseNumbers -n bool:  bool  non-zero, recognise numbers (now obsolete, use -C "0123456789")

title: Download gocr executable — gocrDownload
text: Download gocr executable

title: Download gocr executable — gocrDownload
code: gocrDownload(   version_number = "048",   overwrite = FALSE,   target_dir = file.path(system.file(package = "kwb.gocr"), "extdata/gocr") )

title: Download gocr executable — gocrDownload
text: version_number latest version number "049". However, "048" used development R package still available (default: "048") overwrite TRUE downloads overwrites existing gocr executable target_directory, otherwise (default: FALSE) target_dir target directory (default: file.path(system.file(package = "kwb.gocr"), "extdata/gocr2")

title: Download gocr executable — gocrDownload
text: downloads gocr executable target directory returns path

title: Download gocr executable — gocrDownload
code: gocrDownload(version_number = "048") #> Downloading 'gocr048.exe' executable from 'https://www-e.uni-magdeburg.de/jschulen/ocr/gocr048.exe' to 'D:/a/_temp/Library/kwb.gocr/extdata/gocr/gocr048.exe' ... ok. (1.76s)  #> [1] "D:/a/_temp/Library/kwb.gocr/extdata/gocr/gocr048.exe" gocrDownload(version_number = "049") #> Downloading 'gocr049.exe' executable from 'https://www-e.uni-magdeburg.de/jschulen/ocr/gocr049.exe' to 'D:/a/_temp/Library/kwb.gocr/extdata/gocr/gocr049.exe' ...  #> Warning: URL 'https://www-e.uni-magdeburg.de/jschulen/ocr/gocr049.exe': Timeout of 60 seconds was reached #> Error in download.file(url = paths$exe_source, destfile = paths$exe_target): cannot open URL 'https://www-e.uni-magdeburg.de/jschulen/ocr/gocr049.exe'

what: Run gocr on an Image File — gocrRun
title: Run gocr on an Image File — gocrRun
text: Run gocr Image File

title: Run gocr on an Image File — gocrRun
code: gocrRun(   config,   useBatch = TRUE,   waitForBatch = TRUE,   opendir = TRUE,   dbg = TRUE )

title: Run gocr on an Image File — gocrRun
text: config gocr configuration returned gocrConfig useBatch TRUE (default), batch file written user can reproduce call double-clicking batch file file explorer (opens opendir TRUE) waitForBatch passed kwb.gocr:::writeAndRunBatchFile opendir TRUE (default), useBatch TRUE, directory batch file written, opened Windows Explorer dbg TRUE debug messages shown

title: Run gocr on an Image File — gocrRun
text: (waitForBatch = TRUE): result OCR vector    character representing recognised lines. result vector    attribute config containing configuration used (original config,   default values set needed)

title: Value for Mode Option — optionValueMode
text: Value Mode Option

title: Value for Mode Option — optionValueMode
code: optionValueMode(   useDatabase = FALSE,   layoutAnalysis = FALSE,   doNotCompare = FALSE,   doNotDivide = FALSE,   doNotCorrect = FALSE,   characterPacking = FALSE,   extendDatabase = FALSE,   switchOffEngine = FALSE )

title: Value for Mode Option — optionValueMode
text: useDatabase (2) use database recognize characters recognized algorithms, (early development) layoutAnalysis (4) switching layout analysis zoning (development) doNotCompare (8) compare unrecognized characters recognized one doNotDivide (16) try divide overlapping characters two three single characters doNotCorrect (32) context correction characterPacking (64) character packing, recognition starts, similar characters searched one characters send recognition engine (development) extendDatabase (128) extend database, prompts user unidentified characters extends database users answer (128+2, early development) switchOffEngine (256) switch recognition engine (makes sense together -m 2)

title: Value for Mode Option — optionValueMode
text: http://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/gutsy/man1/gocr.1.html

title: Value for Option Verbosity — optionValueVerbosity
text: Value Option Verbosity

title: Value for Option Verbosity — optionValueVerbosity
code: optionValueVerbosity(   printMore = 1,   listShapes = 1,   listPattern = 1,   printPattern = 1,   printDebug = 1,   createOutPng = 0 )

title: Value for Option Verbosity — optionValueVerbosity
text: printMore (1) print info listShapes (2) list shapes boxes (see -c) stderr listPattern (4) list pattern boxes (see -c) stderr printPattern (8) print pattern recognition debugging printDebug (16) print debug information recognition lines stderr createOutPng (32) create outXX.png boxes lines marked general OCR-step

title: kwb.gocr 0.1.0 2022-06-10
text: download_gocr(): added function download gocr executable instead shipping within R package Harmonise kwb.pkgbuild Added NEWS.md file track changes package. see https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html writing good NEWS.md
